text: how to stop a for loop
I am writing a code to determine if every element in my nxn list is the same.
[[0,0],[0,0]] returns true but [[0,1],[0,0]] will return false.
I was thinking of writing a code that stops immediately when it finds an element that is not the same as the first element.

code:
n=L[0][0]
m=len(A)
for i in range(m):
 for j in range(m):
   if
    L[i][j]==n: -continue the loop-
   else: -stop the loop-

text: I would like to stop this loop if L[i][j]!==n  and return false.
How would I go about implementing this?
